page.title: 17A day in the life of Emma
page.content: On 5 June I got up at 7.00 and put on apink dress, a cardigan, socks and pants.For breakfast I had rice crispys.I got to school and read.Then we did a crossword for the Domesday Project and a sum. At play I played on a barrel.We came in and did our Maths and English.For dinner we had roast potatoes, baked beans and sausage roll. For afters we had blancmange. Mrs Lavis took us for singing after dinner. After singing we did P.E. At play we finished some maths. We read until home time .Zoe came and played dressing up. At tea we had crumpets and swiss roll. Then I went round the block put my nighty on and went to bed.
